title: Mel B left squirming as Keith Lemon grills her on ex-boyfriend Peter Andre

Mel B was left squirming on Celebrity Juice this week when Keith Lemon grilled her about her romance with ex-boyfriend Peter Andre .

The Spice Girls star, 44, dated the Aussie singer for nine months back in 1996 during the height of the band's fame.

The relationship came back to haunt this week while she was filming the comedy game show as Keith seemed determined to get some gossip out of her.

Keith started by asking the panel about childhood sweethearts, asking Mel whether she had one.

She looked shocked and simply replied: "Yep".

Mel played coy, giving one word answers and saying "well uhhh" before laying her head on the desk in exasperation.

(Image: Getty Images)

(Image: Press Association)

Keith refuses to give up, and asks Mel to look into the camera and give Peter a message.

Scary Spice said: "Not doing it, that's going to be the f*****g trailer..."

However, she then gives in to Keith and records her message for Peter, saying: "You're very lovely."

Mel then turns back to Keith and yells: "Why are you doing this?"

(Image: ITV)

The singer previously opened up about her romance with Peter during her appearance on Piers Morgan's Life Stories earlier this year.

She called him her "booty call" and confessed she used to sneak him into hotel rooms without her bandmates knowing.

Mel said: "The Spice Girls didn't know he was my booty call so I had to explain it to them that all this time in different hotels I would fly him in and fly him back out!"

She previously called him a "fantastic lover" and "so polite".

Peter, who went on to wed Katie Price , is now happily married to doctor Emily.
